com.google.api.gax.retrying

Interface ExceptionRetryAlgorithm


  • public interface ExceptionRetryAlgorithm
    An exception retry algorithm is responsible for the following operations:
    1. Accepting or rejecting a task for retry depending on the exception thrown by the previous attempt.
    2. Creating TimedAttemptSettings for each subsequent retry attempt.
    Implementations of this interface must be thread-safe.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean accept(Throwable prevThrowable)
      Returns true if another attempt should be made, or false otherwise.
      TimedAttemptSettings createNextAttempt(Throwable prevThrowable, TimedAttemptSettings prevSettings)
      Creates a next attempt TimedAttemptSettings.

    • Method Detail

      • createNextAttempt

        TimedAttemptSettings createNextAttempt(Throwable prevThrowable,
                                       TimedAttemptSettings prevSettings)
        Creates a next attempt TimedAttemptSettings.
        Parameters:
        prevThrowable - exception thrown by the previous attempt
        prevSettings - previous attempt settings
        Returns:
        next attempt settings or null, if the implementing algorithm does not provide specific settings for the next attempt

      • accept

        boolean accept(Throwable prevThrowable)
        Returns true if another attempt should be made, or false otherwise.
        Parameters:
        prevThrowable - exception thrown by the previous attempt
